pli-tv-bi-vb-pc43:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc43:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo suttaṃ kantanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc43:6.3: Manussā vihāracārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc43:6.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo suttaṃ kantissanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc43:7.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc43:7.2: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc43:7.3: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo suttaṃ kantissantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc43:7.4: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo suttaṃ kantantī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc43:7.7: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo suttaṃ kantissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc43:7.8: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc43:7.9: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc43:9.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc43:10.3: khomaṃ, kappāsikaṃ, koseyyaṃ, kambalaṃ, sāṇaṃ, bhaṅgaṃ.
